00176  bool IsClosed(bool bArchive) const 
00177  {
00178   if (bArchive)
00179    return GetCurrentVolume() == ZIP_VOLUME_NUMBER_UNSPECIFIED;
00180   else
00181    return !m_pFile || !m_bInMemory && m_pFile->IsClosed();
00182  }

00200  DWORD Read(void* pBuf, DWORD iSize, bool bAtOnce);

00212  ZIP_SIZE_TYPE GetPosition() const
00213  {
00214   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uPos = (ZIP_SIZE_TYPE)(m_pFile->GetPosition()) + m_uBytesInWriteBuffer;
00215   if (m_uCurrentVolume == 0)
00216    uPos -= m_uBytesBeforeZip;
00217   return uPos;
00218  }

00227  void Flush();

00233  void FlushFile()
00234  {
00235   if (!m_bInMemory && !IsReadOnly())
00236    m_pFile->Flush();
00237  }
00238 
00239  void FlushBuffers()
00240  {
00241   Flush();
00242   FlushFile();
00243  }

00287  int IsSegmented() const
00288  {
00289   return m_iSegmMode == noSegments ? 0 : (m_bNewSegm ? 1 : -1);
00290  }
00291 
00298  bool IsSplit() const
00299  {
00300   return m_iSegmMode == splitArchive;
00301  }
00302 
00309  bool IsSpanned() const
00310  {
00311   return m_iSegmMode == spannedArchive;
00312  }

00317  bool IsReadOnly()
00318  {
00319   return m_bReadOnly || IsSegmented() < 0;
